name: Untitled Horror Game (kuars14)
description:
Small horror game that I made to play with my friends. Mostly a pashion project.

All assets have been taken from Unreal Engine Marketplace and some I made myself. (yes I did the code by myself other than the template movement code)

There are 2 Gamemodes(Might add more later):

-Survive: Survive for as long as you can against the "monster", the monster can be slowed down with bullets. After a minute, every player will recieve an AR. after 5 total minutes have passed all players will recieve a shotgun.

-Adventure: You have to collect 10 car batteries to repair your car and go back on the road. You can also find a couple of AR's and shotguns in this gamemode. The monster spawns very far away from you in this mode, so you'll be safe for the first minute or so.

How to play the game:

-WASD to move and use your mouse to look around
-Left Mouse Click to fire
-You can equip the Pistol with the 1 key, AR with 2 and shotgun with 3 (if you have them in your inventory of course.)
-F for the Flashlight.
